title: Goblin Scrabbler (2C64)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	4
Vitality:	1
Site:	4
Game Text:	When you play this minion, you may discard an [Elven] condition. The roaming penalty for each [Moria] Orc you play is -1.
Lore:	“Orcs were as keen as hounds on a scent, it was said, but they could also climb.”
Rarity:	C
